titles.title: Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003

To repeal the so-called Forest Service Appeals Reform Act and to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to develop an administrative appeals process for the Forest Service in the same manner as other Federal land management agencies.
Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary: Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003 - Repeals the Appeals Reform Act.Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to develop an administrative appeals process for the Forest Service.
